```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}

x <- c(1:13)
y1 <- (ihw_res_admm@weights[, 1])
y2 <- (ihw_res_old@weights[, 1])
# Plot the first plot
plot(x, y1, type = "l", col = "blue", ylim = c(0, max(y1, y2)), xlab = "x", ylab = "y")

# Add the second plot
lines(x, y2, type = "l", col = "red")

```

```{r}
x <- c(1:13)
y3 <- ihw_res_admm@weights[, 1]
y4 <- ihw_res_old@weights[, 1]
y5 <- ihw_res_cvxr@weights[, 1]
# Plot the first plot
plot(x, y3, type = "l", col = "blue", ylim = c(0, max(y3, y4)), xlab = "x", ylab = "y")

# Add the second plot
lines(x, y4, type = "l", col = "red")

# Add the second plot
lines(x, y5, type = "l", col = "green")

```
